name: Jet Battle Combat
description:
Jet Battle Combat is the best advanced dogfight game , an awesome and addictive air fight game . Become the lord of the skies and fight with the F18 aircraft jet and defeat your enemies and opponents ,Destroy Aircraft carriers and try to last as long as possible .So you can download this game and test the addictive experience of air attack battle scenes .

Features :
- Competent performance of the game and great graphics
- Easy realistic and smooth controls
- High quality environment and realistic AI
- Exciting Cinematic effects!
